name: Siege Runner
description:
As the lone hero, launch powerful arcane magic and agilely leap and dash across the dangerous obstacles posed by the collapsing castle around you while defeating evil invaders: goblins, orcs and imps... in Siege Runner!

  • Challenge an infinite sprawl of falling gates, pitfalls and three types of enemies!
  • Customize your character with 8 different skins!
  • 16:9 resolution support up to 4K!
  • Warning: easy to pick up, hard to master! How far will you get?
  • Supports Keyboard + Mouse with Partial Controller support (RB + LB buttons).

Siege Runner is my debut game and is free to download for Windows and Mac with a Linux and Android port coming soon!
